@description.name: @description

@param.name: @param
@param.body: name {Object} Name of the layout property

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {Object} Value of the layout property

@param.name: @param
@param.body: availWidth {Integer} Final width available for the content (in pixel)
@param.description: Final width available for the content (in pixel)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: availHeight {Integer} Final height available for the content (in pixel)
@param.description: Final height available for the content (in pixel)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: padding {Map} Map containing the padding values. Keys: top, bottom, left, right
@param.description: Map containing the padding values. Keys: top, bottom, left, right

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxObjectId. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxObjectId}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property qxObjectId. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxObjectId}.
